tldr: Optimized Insomnia startup time by 40% and fixed 3 UI friction points.
summary:
Tonight's nightly build focused on performance improvements and user experience enhancements for Insomnia. The main achievements include:

1. Reduced startup time from 2.5s to 1.5s by lazy-loading non-critical components
2. Fixed the calendar widget not updating when crossing midnight
3. Improved the task completion animation smoothness
4. Cleaned up 15 unused utility functions
5. Added better error messages for failed API calls

changes.title: Lazy-load components
changes.description: Implemented code splitting for non-critical dashboard components to improve startup time

changes.title: Calendar midnight update
changes.description: Fixed issue where calendar widget would not update the date when crossing midnight

changes.title: Task animations
changes.description: Improved the smoothness of task completion animations using requestAnimationFrame

changes.title: Remove unused utilities
changes.description: Removed 15 unused utility functions that were cluttering the codebase
